author: Al Jazeera
title: Zimbabwe president threatens fake news author with 20 years' jail
description: Statement purporting to bear President Mnangagwa's signature said coronavirus lockdown would be extended.
content:
Zimbabwe's President Emmerson Mnangagwa has threatened a jail term of up to 20 years to the author of a statement, purporting to bear his signature, that said the lockdown to contain the coronavirus outbreak had been extended.
Mnangagwa, who was speaking at … [+2049 chars]
